## AcceptedConflicts type

Accepted Conflicts

This shows which stage is accepted when a conflict occurs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AcceptedConflicts = {
    ours: {
        put: string[];
        remove: string[];
    };
    theirs: {
        put: string[];
        remove: string[];
    };
};
```
